a.xlink:title: TAction is the base class for VCL action objects. TAction implements actions to be used with menu items and controls. The published properties and events of TAction actions can be managed in the Object Inspector at design time.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TCustomAction is the base class for VCL actions intended to be used with menu items and controls.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TActionList maintains a list of actions that can be used by components and controls such as menu items and buttons.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: The usual list of actions (without published properties) in VCL

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: An animated rotating display indicating that the application is performing some activity.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: The base class for TActivityIndicator.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Base class for the binding scope component. TBaseBindScopeComponent is the ancestor for the TCustomBindScope component. TBaseBindScopeComponent provides functionality for adding scope mappings, getting scope members and values, returning the scope itself or the scope of a member. It also provides properties for accessing the binding expressions in this scope and the scope mappings.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Base class for scope with supports linking

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TComponent is the common ancestor of all component classes.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TBasicAction is the ancestor class for all action objects.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Wrapper for Pascal class TBasicBindComponent

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Represents the base class for the binding list.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TControl is the base class for all components that are visible at run time.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: The base class for list of actions, without the published properties.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Class for Vista and newer Windows operating systems style file open dialogs.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TMenu is the base type for menu components such as TMainMenu and TPopupMenu.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TMenuItem describes the properties of an item in a menu.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TOpenDialog displays a file-selection dialog.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TTimer encapsulates the Windows API timer functions.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Is a bind source that supports adapters to connect to different types of data.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Is a base class that implements a bind source for creating sample data.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TContainedAction is the base class for actions that can be grouped by category and that can appear in action lists.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Implements the bindings list component. TBindingsList is built on the TCustomBindingsList component and publishes additional properties that can be accessed from within the Object Inspector.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TBoundLabel is the type of a labeled edit control's label.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TWinControl is the base class for all controls that are wrappers for Microsoft Windows screen objects.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TLabel is a nonwindowed control that displays text on a form.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TPersistent is the ancestor for all objects that have assignment and streaming capabilities.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Base class for controls that wrap Windows screen objects but perform their own rendering.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: The base class for TToggleSwitch.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TMediaPlayer controls devices that provide a Media Control Interface (MCI) driver.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: Is a bind source for creating sample data.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: A clickable control that allows a user to toggle between an On state and an Off state.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TMainMenu encapsulates a menu bar and its accompanying drop-down menus for a form.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TPopupMenu encapsulates the properties, methods, and events of a pop-up menu.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TObject is the ultimate ancestor of all objects and components.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans

a.xlink:title: TSaveDialog displays a "Save As" dialog for saving files.

text.font-family: Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans
